languages.text: Новатор Кассия на много дней затворилась в своей обители, а вышла из нее уже вооруженная самым устрашающим орудием, какое видел Дом Орселлио. Сам Атлас Звездных Путей она обратила в инструмент уничтожения, и с ним ей удалось истребить пестрых ксеносов, посягнувших на ее дом. Отпраздновав победу, она внезапно для всех продолжила изыскания, начатые когда-то Новатором Тисифоной, хотя все знали, какое отвращение Кассия испытывала к ним прежде. Новатору было ведомо, что Атлас Звездных Путей медленно искажается, а ксеносы обязательно вернутся, и она обязана была защитить свой дом.

Novator Cassia shut herself in her chambers for many days. When she emerged, she wielded the most fearsome weapon House Orsellio had ever seen. She had transformed the Starway Atlas itself into an instrument of destruction. With it, she was able to exterminate the various xenos encroaching on her House. After celebrating her victory, to everyone's astonishment she suddenly decided to continue the research that Novator Tisiphone had started, though it was no secret that she had held it in great contempt in the past. The Novator knew that the Starway Atlas was slowly becoming twisted, that the xenos would doubtless return, and that she had a duty to protect her House.
languages.original_text: Новатор Кассия на много дней затворилась в своей обители, а вышла из нее уже вооруженная самым устрашающим орудием, какое видел Дом Орселлио. Сам Атлас Звездных Путей она обратила в инструмент уничтожения, и с ним ей удалось истребить пестрых ксеносов, посягнувших на ее дом. Отпраздновав победу, она внезапно для всех продолжила изыскания, начатые когда-то Новатором Тисифоной, хотя все знали, какое отвращение Кассия испытывала к ним прежде. Новатору было ведомо, что Атлас Звездных Путей медленно искажается, а ксеносы обязательно вернутся, и она обязана была защитить свой дом.

traits.locale_text: Novator Cassia shut herself in her abode for many days, and when she emerged from it, she wielded the most fearsome weapon House Orsellio had ever seen. The Starway Atlas itself she turned into the instrument of destruction. Using it, she was able to exterminate the motley xenos, who tried to encroach on her House. After the celebration of this victory, she decided to everyone's astonishment she suddenly decided to continue the research that Novator Tisiphone started. People knew that before this Cassia regarded them with great contempt. Yet Novator knew that Starway Atlas slowly deforming, that xenos will return without a doubt, and that she had to protect her House.

Yet Novator knew that Starway Atlas slowly deforming, that xenos will return without a doubt, and that she had to protect her House.

She had transformed the Starway Atlas itself into an instrument of destruction. With it, she was able to exterminate the various xenos encroaching on her House. After celebrating her victory, to everyone's astonishment she suddenly decided to continue the research that Novator Tisiphone had started, though it was no secret that she had held it in great contempt in the past. The Novator knew that the Starway Atlas was slowly becoming twisted, that the xenos would doubtless return, and that she had a duty to protect her House.

languages.text: 卡西娅大族长将自己关在房间里，独自度过了许多天。当她再度出现时，她手里挥舞着奥赛罗家族所见过的最可怕的武器——她将群星圣仪本身变成了一件用来毁灭的武器。有了这件武器，她顺利地消灭了入侵家族的异形之敌。庆祝完胜利之后，出乎所有人的意料，她突然决定继续进行前任大族长提西福涅的研究，而家族的所有人都很清楚，她过去一直都非常鄙夷这样的研究。然而，只有卡西娅知道，群星圣仪正在慢慢发生畸变，那些异形也必定会卷土重来，她必须守护她的家族。
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia shut herself in her chambers for many days. When she emerged, she wielded the most fearsome weapon House Orsellio had ever seen. She had transformed the Starway Atlas itself into an instrument of destruction. With it, she was able to exterminate the various xenos encroaching on her House. After celebrating her victory, to everyone's astonishment she suddenly decided to continue the research that Novator Tisiphone had started, though it was no secret that she had held it in great contempt in the past. The Novator knew that the Starway Atlas was slowly becoming twisted, that the xenos would doubtless return, and that she had a duty to protect her House.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅大族长将自己关在房间里，独自度过了许多天。当她再度出现时，她手里挥舞着奥塞罗家族所见过的最可怕的武器——她将群星圣仪本身变成了一件用来毁灭的武器。有了这件武器，她顺利地消灭了入侵家族的异形之敌。庆祝完胜利之后，出乎所有人的意料，她突然决定继续进行前任大族长提西福涅的研究，而家族的所有人都很清楚，她过去一直都非常鄙夷这样的研究。然而，只有卡西娅知道，群星圣仪正在慢慢发生畸变，那些异形也必定会卷土重来，她必须保护好她的家族。

languages.text: Novatorin Cassia sperrte sich viele Tage lang in ihren Gemächern ein. Als sie wieder hinaustrat, führte sie die furchterregendste Waffe, die das Haus Orsellio jemals gesehen hatte. Sie hatte den Atlas der Sternenwege selbst in ein Instrument der Zerstörung verwandelt. Damit war sie in der Lage, die verschiedenen Xenos auszulöschen, die ihr Haus bedrohten. Nachdem sie ihren Sieg gefeiert hatte, entschied sie zum allgemeinen Erstaunen, die Forschungsarbeit von Novatorin Tisiphone fortzusetzen. Und das, obwohl sie dafür bisher immer nur Verachtung übrig gehabt hatte. Die Novatorin wusste, dass der Atlas der Sternenwege dabei war, sich langsam zu verformen; dass die Xenos zweifellos zurückkehren würden; und dass sie die Pflicht hatte, ihr Haus zu beschützen.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia shut herself in her chambers for many days. When she emerged, she wielded the most fearsome weapon House Orsellio had ever seen. She had transformed the Starway Atlas itself into an instrument of destruction. With it, she was able to exterminate the various xenos encroaching on her House. After celebrating her victory, to everyone's astonishment she suddenly decided to continue the research that Novator Tisiphone had started, though it was no secret that she had held it in great contempt in the past. The Novator knew that the Starway Atlas was slowly becoming twisted, that the xenos would doubtless return, and that she had a duty to protect her House.

traits.locale_text: Novatorin Cassia sperrte sich viele Tage lang in ihren Gemächern ein. Als sie wieder hinaustrat, führte sie die furchterregendste Waffe, die das Haus Orsellio jemals gesehen hatte. Sie hatte den Atlas der Sternenwege selbst in ein Instrument der Zerstörung verwandelt. Damit war sie in der Lage, die verschiedenen Xenos auszulöschen, die ihr Haus bedrohten. Nachdem sie ihren Sieg gefeiert hatte, entschied sie zum allgemeinen Erstaunen, die Forschungsarbeit von Novatorin Tisiphone fortzusetzen. Und das, obwohl sie dafür bisher immer nur Verachtung übrig gehabt hatte. Die Novatorin wusste, dass der Atlas der Sternenwege dabei war, sich langsam zu verformen; dass die Xenos zweifellos zurückkehren würden; und dass sie ihr Haus beschützen musste.

languages.text: La Novator Cassia se cloîtra dans sa chambre durant plusieurs jours. Quand elle en ressortit, elle détenait l'arme la plus redoutable jamais vue par la famille Orsellio : elle avait transformé l'Atlas des étoiles en instrument de destruction. Grâce à lui, elle parvint à exterminer les xénos qui parasitaient sa maison. Après avoir fêté sa victoire, elle décida soudain de continuer les recherches entamées par la Novator Tisiphone, au grand étonnement de tous ceux qui savaient que Cassia lui vouait autrefois un profond mépris. La Novator savait que l'Atlas des étoiles se déformait lentement et que les xénos ne manqueraient pas de revenir. Il fallait donc qu'elle protège sa maison.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia shut herself in her chambers for many days. When she emerged, she wielded the most fearsome weapon House Orsellio had ever seen. She had transformed the Starway Atlas itself into an instrument of destruction. With it, she was able to exterminate the various xenos encroaching on her House. After celebrating her victory, to everyone's astonishment she suddenly decided to continue the research that Novator Tisiphone had started, though it was no secret that she had held it in great contempt in the past. The Novator knew that the Starway Atlas was slowly becoming twisted, that the xenos would doubtless return, and that she had a duty to protect her House.

traits.locale_text: La Novator Cassia se cloîtra dans sa chambre durant plusieurs jours. Quand elle en ressortit, elle détenait l’arme la plus redoutable jamais vue par la famille Orsellio : elle avait transformé l'Atlas des étoiles en instrument de destruction. Grâce à lui, elle parvint à exterminer les xénos qui parasitaient sa maison. Après avoir fêté sa victoire, elle décida soudain de continuer les recherches entamées par la Novator Tisiphone, au grand étonnement de tous ceux qui savaient que Cassia lui vouait autrefois un profond mépris. La Novator savait que l'Atlas des étoiles se déformait peu à peu et que les xénos ne manqueraient pas de revenir. Il fallait donc qu'elle protège sa maison.

languages.text: La Novator Cassia se pasó días encerrada en sus aposentos. Cuando resurgió, poseía el arma más aterradora que había visto nunca la casa Orsellio: había transformado el propio Atlas de las Vías Estelares en una herramienta de destrucción. Con ella, fue capaz de exterminar a los numerosos xenos que asediaban su casa. Tras celebrar su victoria, decidió, para sorpresa de todos los presentes, continuar con la investigación que había iniciado la Novator Tisiphone, a pesar de que era bien sabido que hasta entonces la había considerado un grave error. La Novator sabía que el Atlas se estaba deformando poco a poco, que los xenos volverían y que era su deber proteger su casa.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia shut herself in her chambers for many days. When she emerged, she wielded the most fearsome weapon House Orsellio had ever seen. She had transformed the Starway Atlas itself into an instrument of destruction. With it, she was able to exterminate the various xenos encroaching on her House. After celebrating her victory, to everyone's astonishment she suddenly decided to continue the research that Novator Tisiphone had started, though it was no secret that she had held it in great contempt in the past. The Novator knew that the Starway Atlas was slowly becoming twisted, that the xenos would doubtless return, and that she had a duty to protect her House.

traits.locale_text: La Novator Cassia se pasó días encerrada en sus aposentos. Cuando resurgió, poseía el arma más aterradora que había visto nunca la casa Orsellio: había transformado el propio Atlas de las Vías Estelares en una herramienta de destrucción. Con ella, fue capaz de exterminar a los numerosos xenos que asediaban su casa. Tras celebrar su victoria, decidió, para sorpresa de todos los presentes, continuar con la investigación que había iniciado la Novator Tisiphone, a pesar de que era bien sabido que hasta entonces la había considerado un grave error. La Novator sabía que el Atlas se estaba deformando poco a poco, que los xenos volverían y que era su deber proteger su casa.

languages.text: ノベイター・カシアは何日も寝室に閉じこもっていた。彼女が寝室から出てきたとき、オーセリオ家がかつて見たこともないような恐ろしい武器を持っていた。彼女はスターウェイ・アトラス自体を破壊の道具に変えたのだ。それを使い、彼女はオーセリオ家に忍び寄る様々な異種族を駆逐することを可能と下。勝利を祝った後、彼女は突然ノベイター・ティシフォンが始めた研究を続けることを決意した。ノベイターはスターウェイ・アトラスが徐々に変形していること、異種族が間違いなく戻ってくること、そして自分の一族を守らなければならないことを知っていた。
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia shut herself in her chambers for many days. When she emerged, she wielded the most fearsome weapon House Orsellio had ever seen. She had transformed the Starway Atlas itself into an instrument of destruction. With it, she was able to exterminate the various xenos encroaching on her House. After celebrating her victory, to everyone's astonishment she suddenly decided to continue the research that Novator Tisiphone had started, though it was no secret that she had held it in great contempt in the past. The Novator knew that the Starway Atlas was slowly becoming twisted, that the xenos would doubtless return, and that she had a duty to protect her House.

traits.locale_text: ノベイター・カシアは何日も寝室に閉じこもっていた。彼女が寝室から出てきたとき、オーセリオ家がかつて見たこともないような恐ろしい武器を持っていた。彼女はスターウェイ・アトラス自体を破壊の道具に変えたのだ。それを使い、彼女はオーセリオ家に忍び寄る様々な異種族を駆逐することを可能と下。勝利を祝った後、彼女は突然ノベイター・ティシフォンが始めた研究を続けることを決意した。ノベイターはスターウェイ・アトラスが徐々に変形していること、異種族が間違いなく戻ってくること、そして自分の一族を守らなければならないことを知っていた。

languages.text: Rota Reisi Cassia, kendisini günlerce odasına kilitledi. Dışarı çıktığında Orsellio Hanesi'nin gördüğü en korkunç silah elindeydi. Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nı bir yıkım aracına dönüştürmüştü. Onu kullanarak Hanesine el uzatan zenoları bertaraf etmeyi başardı. Zaferini kutladıktan sonra herkesi hayrete düşüren bir şekilde, aniden Rota Reisi Tisiphone'nin araştırmasına devam etme kararı aldı. Üstelik bu araştırmaya geçmişte büyük nefret beslediği herkesçe biliniyordu. Rota Reisi, Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nın yavaş yavaş çarpıklaştığını, zenoların mutlaka geri döneceğini ve Hanesini koruma sorumluluğunun da kendisinde olduğunu biliyordu.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia shut herself in her chambers for many days. When she emerged, she wielded the most fearsome weapon House Orsellio had ever seen. She had transformed the Starway Atlas itself into an instrument of destruction. With it, she was able to exterminate the various xenos encroaching on her House. After celebrating her victory, to everyone's astonishment she suddenly decided to continue the research that Novator Tisiphone had started, though it was no secret that she had held it in great contempt in the past. The Novator knew that the Starway Atlas was slowly becoming twisted, that the xenos would doubtless return, and that she had a duty to protect her House.

traits.locale_text: Rota Reisi Cassia kendisini günlerce odasına kilitledi. Yeniden ortaya çıktığında Orsellio Hanesi'nin gördüğü en korkunç silahı taşıyordu. Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nı bir yıkım aracına dönüştürmüştü. Onu kullanarak Hane'sine el uzatan zenoları bertaraf etmeyi başardı. Zaferini kutladıktan sonra herkesi hayrete düşüren bir şekilde, aniden Rota Reisi Tisiphone'nin araştırmasına devam etme kararı aldı, ki bu araştırmaya geçmişte büyük bir nefret beslediği herkesçe biliniyordu. Rota Reisi, Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nın yavaş yavaş çarpık bir hâl aldığını, zenoların mutlaka geri döneceğini ve Hane'sini koruma sorumluluğunun da kendisinde olduğunu biliyordu.
